This is an R package for performing taking high resolution images (in raw, CR2 format)
and then identifying squares that are outside of the norm.  These are cropped out and placed
in a folder so people can classify them into categories of training data.


## Installation

Do it from GitHub:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("eriqande/dirtybirds")
```
